# f5distributedcloud_policy_based_routing (Resource)

Manages an F5 XC Policy Based Routing resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Policy Based Routing.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Policy Based Routing is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the Policy Based Routing.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Policy Based Routing.
